com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface ICMPReplyListener

public interface ICMPReplyListener

Callback interface to be used for host availability notifications in the ICMPService.

Method Summary
 void onError(java.net.InetAddress address, int errorCode, long timeout)
          ICMP ECHO error notification sent by the native component when ECHO request cannot be sent.
 void onReply(java.net.InetAddress address, long timeout)
          Successful ICMP ECHO reply notification
 void onTimeout(java.net.InetAddress address, long timeout)
          ICMP ECHO timeout notification sent when HostPinger did not receive ECHO reply within specified time frame
 

Method Detail

onError

void onError(java.net.InetAddress address,
             int errorCode,
             long timeout)
ICMP ECHO error notification sent by the native component when ECHO request cannot be sent.

Parameters:
address - remote host address
errorCode - system error code
timeout - actual timeout system waited for the response

onReply

void onReply(java.net.InetAddress address,
             long timeout)
Successful ICMP ECHO reply notification

Parameters:
address - remote host address
timeout - actual timeout system waited for the response

onTimeout

void onTimeout(java.net.InetAddress address,
               long timeout)
ICMP ECHO timeout notification sent when HostPinger did not receive ECHO reply within specified time frame

Parameters:
address - remote host address
timeout - actual timeout system waited for the response (can be more than timeout defined in the requests, depending on number of hosts and delays in the listener)
